About Us

Latest Event Photos

Contact Us

Founded in Boulder, CO circa. 2015, Boulder Collective is a local group of freelancers, creatives, and developers. We're here to connect and unite Boulder's ever-growing freelance/creative community in a different way. The most successful freelancers today succeed bacause they have large and supportive networks. We're here to:

  • Provide MORE freelancers an opportunity to grow their networks via local events, meetups, parties, and more.
  • Build Boulder's largest events-based community of freelancers and creatives in the hopes that numbers

If you would like more information about the Collective or are interested in sponsoring an event, please reach out to us at media@bouldercollective.com
